description: A humorous take on predicting weather.
title: Winter Forecast
n_1: On a chilly day, Dad and Kid are talking about winter.
c1_1: Do you think it's going to snow this winter?
c2_1: I don't know, it's all up in the air.
n_2: Dad smiles, looking up at the sky.
c2_2: Yeah, I hope it snows a lot!
n_3: They both laugh, imagining the snow.
